title: Psyche Lab — Quiet Mandalas & Visionary Discipline
summary: Phyllotaxis and gentle L-systems for dream mandalas; Jung/von Franz informed symbolism with ND-safe palettes.
safe_use: Soft edges; low saturation; allow pause; no recursive motion spirals.
procedures: Pick 'phyllotaxis_quiet' from psyche.json; render 144 points at 137.5°.
Optionally place small planetary glyph at center (12–18% opacity).
references: Jung — Liber Novus, Marie-Louise von Franz
